languages.text: "Презренный юкко, вывалившийся из-под хвоста своей гнилоутробной матери. Пока мы искореняли нелюдей, ты распивал с ними хмель... Знай я об этом раньше, вырвал бы твое чернильное сердце из груди!"

"It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"
languages.original_text: "Презренный юкко, вывалившийся из-под хвоста своей гнилоутробной матери. Пока мы искореняли нелюдей, ты распивал с ними хмель... Знай я об этом раньше, вырвал бы твое чернильное сердце из груди!"

traits.locale_text: "You despicable jukko that dropped from under the tail and from the rotten womb of your mother... While we were trying to weed out the abhumans, you were busy drinking together with them... If I would have known about that sooner, I would have torn your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

"You despicable jukko that dropped from under the tail and from the rotten womb of your mother... While we were trying to weed out the abhumans, you were busy drinking together with them... If I would have known about that sooner, I would have torn your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

"You despicable jukko that dropped from under the tail and from the rotten womb of your mother... While we were trying to eradicate the abhumans, you were busy drinking together with them... Had I known about that sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

"You despicable jukko that dropped from under the tail and from the rotten womb of your mother... While we were trying to eradicate the abhumans, you were busy drinking together with them... Had I known about that sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

"It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome jukko! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

"It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

"It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

languages.text: « C'était un jour bien sombre lorsque vous êtes sorti du ventre vérolé de votre démone de mère, infâme traître ! Pendant que nous nous efforcions d'exterminer les xénos, vous fricotiez avec eux... Si je l'avais su plus tôt, j'aurais arraché votre cœur noir de votre poitrine ! »
languages.original_text: "It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

traits.locale_text: « C'était un jour bien sombre lorsque vous êtes sorti du ventre vérolé de votre démone de mère, infâme jukko ! Pendant que nous nous efforcions d'exterminer les xénos, vous fricotiez avec eux... Si je l'avais su plus tôt, j'aurais arraché votre cœur noir de votre poitrine ! »

languages.text: «¡Funesto fue el día en que caíste del útero podrido de tu madre, vil traidor! Mientras nosotros luchábamos para exterminar a los xenos, tú estabas confraternizando con ellos... ¡De haberlo sabido antes, te habría arrancado el corazón negro del pecho!».
languages.original_text: "It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

traits.locale_text: «Jukko despreciable, arrojado bajo la cola desde el útero putrefacto de tu madre... Mientras nosotros intentábamos erradicar a los pseudohumanos, tú estabas bebiendo con ellos... ¡De haberlo sabido antes, te habría arrancado ese corazón negro del pecho!».

languages.text: “你这个卑鄙的叛徒，你当初就不该从你妈那臭气熏天的烂肚子里钻出来……我们所有人都在忙着消灭异形，可你却在忙着和他们把酒言欢……要是我早知道这些事情，我早就把你那颗黑心挖出来了！”
languages.original_text: "It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

traits.locale_text: “你这个卑鄙的臭杂种，肯定是从你妈臭气熏天的肚子里掉出来的吧……我们所有人都在忙着消灭异形，可你却在忙着和他们一起喝酒……要是我早知道这些事情，我早就把你那颗黑心挖出来了！”

languages.text: "Es war ein dunkler Tag, als Ihr von unter dem Schwanz und aus dem fauligen Schoss Eurer Mutter herausgefallen seid, Ihr elender Verräter! Während wir die Xenos bekämpft haben, um sie auszulöschen, habt Ihr mit ihnen gezecht ... Hätte ich das früher gewusst, hätte ich Euch Euer pechschwarzes Herz aus der Brust gerissen!"
languages.original_text: "It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr widerwärtiges Ungeziefer, das von unter dem Schwanz und dem fauligen Schoss Eurer Mutter herausgefallen ist ... Während wir versucht haben, die Abhumanen auszulöschen, habt Ihr mit ihnen angestoßen ... Hätte ich das früher gewusst, hätte ich Euch Euer pechschwarzes Herz aus der Brust gerissen!"

languages.text: 「尻尾の下の腐った子宮から生まれ落ちてきた卑しい裏切り者め。俺たちが異種族どもを根絶やしにしようとしている間、お前は奴らと酒を酌み交わすのに夢中だったとはな。もっと早くそのことを知っていれば、お前の真っ黒な心臓をその胸から引き抜いてやっただろう！」
languages.original_text: "It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"

traits.locale_text: 「尻尾の下の腐った子宮から生まれ落ちてきた卑しい裏切り者め。俺たちが異種族どもを根絶やしにしようとしている間、お前は奴らと酒を酌み交わすのに夢中だったとはな。もっと早くそのことを知っていれば、お前の真っ黒な心臓をその胸から引き抜いてやっただろう！」

languages.text: "Sen annenin çürümüş rahminden düştüğün gün dünya karardı pis hain! Biz zenoları öldürmek için savaşırken sen onlarla âlem peşinde koşuyordun... Bilsem kara yüreğini göğsünden daha erken söküp atardım!"
languages.original_text: "It was a dark day when you dropped from under the tail of your rotten-wombed mother, you loathsome traitor! While we were fighting to exterminate the xenos, you were busy carousing with them... Had I known sooner, I would have ripped your pitch-black heart right out of your chest!"
